question: Which state saw the majority of execution since 1947?
explanation: According to the study by the National Law University in Delhi, majority of the execution was carried out in Uttar Pradesh since 1947. The state saw the execution of 354 people. The next highest in this list is Haryana, followed by Madhya Pradesh. In 2018 alone, India has imposed 162 new death sentences â€“ 50% more than the previous year and the highest in nearly 2 decades.
